slogan1: The voice of youth, the radio that inspires!
about_text:
ðŸŽ§ Welcome to SPEAK UP Radio at Club Cooee! ðŸŽ¶
If you enjoy good music, lively events, and making new friends, this is the right place! Here, you'll find all rhythms and musical styles, from the latest hits to the classics that made history.

Our team is made up of the best hosts and support staff, always ready to liven up the atmosphere and take care of you with great care and attention.

Stay tuned to the schedule, join the giveaways, and dive into the best vibe on the radio!
ðŸ‘‰ Fun and respect always come first!
best_moments_subtitle: Relive the most incredible moments, parties, and special events from Radio SPEAK UP!
best_moments_cta_title: Want to be part of our next moments?
best_moments_cta_text: Join our community and don't miss any of our upcoming events and special broadcasts!
shows_soon: The show schedule is coming soon!
contact_intro: If you want Speak Up to organize a party for you in Club Cooee, or if you'd like to join us as a supporter or locutor, contact us!
contact_team_card: For joining the Speak Up team
event_anniversary_description: A special celebration of the first year of Radio SPEAK UP
event_halu_description: An amazing performance by our DJ from the Northeast
event_mafiosos_description: Saturday in style, live from the Mafiosos Room! Giveaways, live hosting, fun, and everything you need to enjoy the night your way!
event_vampiros_description: The iconic Vampires Party was elegantly organized to honor our sponsors, Grupo Jordan. A night of mystery, glamour, and unforgettable celebration with RÃ¡dio Speak Up
event_casamento_description: Wedding of Christopher & Raquel, organized with RÃ¡dio Speak Up: special hosting with 'priest' recording, decorated room, and everything ready for an unforgettable moment!
event_atlantica_description: An unforgettable night with the AtlÃ¢ntica Party dedicated to Grupo Jordan â€” lots of excitement to the sound of our radio Speak Up! Music, energy, fun, and celebration in style
event_junina_description: The Festa Junina organized by the Club Cooee moderators featured our radio as part of the vibrant, festive entertainment!
locutores_description: Meet the amazing locutores of Radio Speak Up! Watch videos full of charisma, talent and that vibe that only Speak Up has!
